name: Apathy: Inaba Hyakumantetsu in Narugami Gakuen Reikaiki
summary:
A special feature on the school's Seven Wonders planned by Narukami Gakuen's newspaper club.
However, there are constant rumors that first-year student Shuichi Sakagami, who participated in the project, has gone missing after the meeting of the Seven Wonders.

The truth emerges while listening to the events of the day from Makoto Shindo, Yukihito Ayanokoji, Nozomu Kazama, Akemi Iwashita, and Tomoharu Hosoda, Shoji Arai and Reiko Fukuzawa, the storytellers of the Seven Wonders who participated in the meeting.

Did Shuichi Sakagami really go missing?
